title: gc keys can't handle tombstones effectively
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
master

### Steps to reproduce

### What did you expect?
GC worker can handles `GcTask::GcKeys` effectively.

### What did happened?
It can not. Here is a metrics:
![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8407317/113708644-13aa4c80-9714-11eb-846c-94260bcff49a.png)
